SELECT * FROM (SELECT ORDER_NUM, STATUS, TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE, ITEM_NAME, QUANTITY, REQUESTER, ORDER_PLACE FROM ORDER_PRODUCT)
or REQUESTER like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
or ORDER_PLACE like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
or ITEM_NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
or ORDER_DATE >= #{startDt}
and ORDER_DATE <= #{endDt}
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT ORDER_NUM, REQUESTER, BRAND_NAME, ITEM_TYPE, ORDER_PLACE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_SIZE, QUANTITY, CHEST, FRONT_LENGTH, SLEEVE_LENGTH, BACK_WIDTH, ARM_WIDTH, REQUIREMENTS, PRODUCT_DETAILS, FILE_PATH FROM ORDER_PRODUCT WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_PRODUCT (REQUESTER, BRAND_NAME, ITEM_TYPE, ORDER_PLACE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_SIZE, QUANTITY, CHEST, FRONT_LENGTH, SLEEVE_LENGTH, BACK_WIDTH, ARM_WIDTH, REQUIREMENTS, PRODUCT_DETAILS, FILE_PATH) VALUES (#{requester}, #{brand}, #{type}, #{place}, #{name}, #{size}, #{quantity}, #{chest}, #{front}, #{sleeve}, #{back}, #{arm}, #{requirements}, #{details}, #{filePath})
mapper.select: SELECT a.ORDER_NUM, b.COMMENTER, b.CONTENT, COMMENT_DATE FROM ORDER_PRODUCT a, ORDER_COMMENT b WHERE a.ORDER_NUM = b.ORDER_NUM ORDER BY COMMENT_DATE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_COMMENT(ORDER_NUM, COMMENTER, CONTENT) VALUES(#{num},#{commenter},#{content})
